WorkItem.ClosedComment: You have almost all your items marked with fixed gems and enchants, so the optimizer can hardly change anything. More in fo in this can be found here:http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=GearOptimization&referringTitle=DocumentationSome of the currently equipped are not marked as available at all.The optimization restraints are not working at the moment, this will be fixed in the next version.
WorkItem.Description: I have posted about a problem i'm having with the rogue expertise cap not being taken into consideration (i'm ending up with 30, way below the expertise cap) and i have been asked to create this issue and attach my character file, so here it is :)

Comments.Message:
I have a lot of gear with exp available (and gems) but the same problem : at the end of the optimization I have 0 (!) exp.
Strange ! (But I'm currently testing this gear combination !!)
